page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: HUNT THE THIMBLE ________________ 1) 5 to 10 people can play Hunt The Thimble 2)There is one person who is on it and that person hides the thimble,and all the others have to try and find it.When someone finds it,that person is then on it,then he or she hides it and then the other people have to try and find it and so on.If they get near the thimble, the others say warm and if they get very close, they say hot or boiling.But if they move away the others say cool, and when they get far away, they say cold or freezing.
